Account Management¶

Welcome to AIZero, Easy AI for Everyone. We believe that there is a way for everyone to use AI easily. AIZero Services provides a list of artificial intelligence services through web service APIs so that every developer can use them easily for standard software applications to consume and integrate.

1. Account Registration¶

To get started, please register your account and receive your API keys. Every API services under the account will be measured and billed on monthly basis.

2. Access Token¶

The API key will serve as your access token. Please include the access token in your HTTP Request header in every API calls for authentication purposes.

3. Usage and Billing¶

Every API calls under the account will be logged and measured for billing. Payment will be charged to your credit card on monthly basis.
